content: Direct market out your services or goods to the web 3.0 owners using our supplied twitter handles. (https://business.twitter.com/en/help/campaign-setup/campaign-targeting/custom-audiences.html) or start tracking sentiment of messages of the web 3.0 bank holders.Sorted on the value of NFT owners highest sales you'll receive access to a ready to use excel, csv or google sheets file containing more than 25.000+ users with the following columns:-Opensea Username,-Twitter Username,-Instagram Username (where available),-Wallet Address,-Last Sale Value (in $USD), (verified by the blockchain itself)-Total Value (in $USD), (top 20 sales, verified by the blockchain itself)This data can be used for✔Marketing Agencies,✔NFT Sellers/Traders,✔Market Analysis Or Sentiment Tracking.Formats:✔Excel,✔Google Sheets,✔CSVData directly available upon purchase! Limited offer for $299.-DM, reply or email dwarl@proton.me
